General.Name: Ampio Pharm
General.Description: Ampio Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, develops therapies for the treatment of osteoarthritis-related pain. It focuses on the preclinical development of AR-300, a novel proprietary, small molecule formulation for the treatment of osteoarthritis of the knee. The company is headquartered in Englewood, Colorado.
General.Address: 373 Inverness Parkway, Englewood, CO, United States, 80112
